channel.title: Hello... i need some help here!
channel.description:
hey. i have decided to change to 508 servers... and it's a kind of a mess in my head right now. so i have to know some basic stuff to actually start coding a 508 server :)
1. how can i add customs like recolors and vesta and stuff? 2. and where? 3. can somone please give me the commands: ::dp, ::bank? 4. and i need to know how i am going to type in tele, item and exp commands? like tele i tele somwhere, item i get items or i type in playername and that player gets item? and exp... like i get exp of that command? 5. and where do i put all of this stuff? 6. where can i change welcome text? 7. is it possible to make an owner rank? like its on 317? 8. (if so) can somone give me a tut or show me how? 9. (if not) how can i make it contain myname instead of p rights 2? 10. how can i make a pickup command?
kneistol... medium 317 coder... very bad 508+ coder

item.title: Hello... i need some help here!
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hey. i have decided to change to 508 servers… and it’s a kind of a mess in my head right now.
so i have to know some basic stuff to actually start coding a 508 server

  1. how can i add customs like recolors and vesta and stuff?
  2. and where?
  3. can somone please give me the commands: ::dp, ::bank?
  4. and i need to know how i am going to type in tele, item and exp commands? like tele i tele somwhere, item i get items or i type in playername and that player gets item? and exp… like i get exp of that command?
  5. and where do i put all of this stuff?
  6. where can i change welcome text?
  7. is it possible to make an owner rank? like its on 317?
  8. (if so) can somone give me a tut or show me how?
  9. (if not) how can i make it contain myname instead of p rights 2?
  10. how can i make a pickup command?

kneistol… medium 317 coder… very bad 508+ coder

Read full topic
